document.full_text: manchester city ended manchester united's chances of winning three trophies in the same season, beating its local rival 1-0 at wembley on saturday to reach its first fa cup final in 30 years.
document.title: man city beats united 1-0 to reach fa cup final
lines_and_colors: manchester city ended manchester united's chances of winning three trophies in the same season, beating its local rival 1-0 at wembley on saturday to reach its first fa cup final in 30 years.
